info.title: EDP CodeJam - Custom Business Partner Event
info.description:
A custom business partner event created for the Event-driven processes CodeJam. A business partner is an organization (company, subsidiary), person or group of people or organizations in which your company has a business interest. The following events are available for business partner:

* Business partner created

x-sap-shortText: Informs a remote system about created business partners in the simulated SAP S/4HANA Cloud system.

sap_s4_cust_ext_ZBUSINESSPARTNER_Created.name: cust.ext.codejam.ZBUSINESSPARTNER.Created.v1
sap_s4_cust_ext_ZBUSINESSPARTNER_Created.description: This event is raised when Business Partner is created.

BusinessPartner.description:
# Definition

Key identifying a **business partner** in the SAP system. The key is unique within a client.

FirstName.description:
# Definition

First name of a **business partner** in the SAP system.

LastName.description:
# Definition

Last name of a **business partner** in the SAP system.

YY1_SAPCommunityDisplayName.description:
# Definition

SAP Community Display Name associated to the Business Partner. Also, this value will be surface to the topic where it will be published and as a header in the CloudEvent (sapcommunityuname).

specversion.description: The version of the CloudEvents specification which the event uses. This enables the interpretation of the context.

type.description: Type of occurrence which has happened. Often this property is used for routing, observability, policy enforcement, etc.

subject.description: The subject of the event in the context of the event producer (identified by source).

time.description: Timestamp of when the occurrence happened. Must adhere to RFC 3339.

sapcommunitydispname.description: Display name in the SAP Community
